attributes.action: International firms should fund the shortfall in the 2016 Paralympic Games
attributes.background:
Amazon , Google and Apple should be shown to do the right thing and apply or otherwise pay taxes otherwise arguably unpaid to fund the  funding shortfall in the 2016 ParaOlympic Games.

The Paralympic movement is about inclusivity, respect and achievement and should be supported and upheld by all.

rejection.details:
The Government has no responsibility to secure funding for the Paralympic Games, and no power to sequestrate money from UK firms to allocate to such funding.

If you wanted legislation to provide for the allocation of the assets of private firms to meet the costs of the Paralympic Games, you could start a petition about that.
